name: simple-website-boilerplate
description: A simple website boilerplate with BrowserSync and Sass

scripts.gh-pages: git branch -D gh-pages; git checkout -b gh-pages && yarn build && git mv _CNAME CNAME && git add -f dist/ && git commit -m 'Publish website' && git push -fu origin gh-pages; git checkout master
